attributes.additional_details: This is very important because children need to be social and come together. Loads of children have been lonely in lockdown and this needs to change!
attributes.background: I want the COVID rules to change so that children can have playdates.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you'd like children to be exempt from rules on indoor mixing, or something else. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
